apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the people holding hands emoji depicts two figures with distinct medium-dark and light skin tones, their hands clasped in a gesture of connection and unity. Apple's signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading lend a warm, inviting realism to the intertwined hands, suggesting partnership, friendship, or solidarity. This emoji beautifully symbolizes closeness and mutual support, conveying a strong sense of togetherness in messages.
